item.name: FRHD-196
item.description: This is applicable for XRv5 only

body.raw:
{
  "input" :
  {
     "ios-cli:command" : "conf t
as-path-set 2
  ios-regex '^$'
end-set
!
as-path-set 11
  ios-regex '^(2914_)+$'
end-set
!
as-path-set 12
  ios-regex '_27699$',
  ios-regex '_9506$'
end-set
!
as-path-set 99
  ios-regex '_16509$',
  ios-regex '^(2914_)+(703_)+$'
end-set
commit
end
"
  }
}

item.name: FRHD-202
item.description: This is applicable for XRv5 only

item.name: create empty interface with nonexisting node
create dry-run commit on nonexisting node

exec: pm.expect(pm.response.json()["output"]["node-sync-status-results"]["node-sync-status-result"][0]["error-message"]).to.eql("Node is missing in uniconfig topology OPERATIONAL datastore.");
